message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Constructive session for mid/small caps. Leadership in pharma (Laurus, Biocon), exchanges/depositories (BSE, CDSL) and PSU/cap goods (BHEL). Telecom towers (IndusTower) continue to base just under a breakout. Our book (~₹27,640) was supported by Laurus strength and steady BSE/CDSL; SAIL stayed range-bound. LTF reclaimed the 300 zone intraday on strong volume, but failed to close above HOD—trail stops remain prudent.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Hold/Trail; add on breakout", "reason": "Closed near 300 with strong volume; momentum continuation above 301.5 could open further upside. Trail risk to ~291.", "price": 299.40},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Add on breakout/dip", "reason": "Theme (exchanges/depositories) remains strong. Add on breakout above 2837 or on a controlled dip to 2795–2805 with tight stop (~2680 for new adds).", "price": 2811.90},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Add on retest/strength", "reason": "Holding >1600; prefer dip buys near 1615–1625 or strength through 1665–1670. Stop for new adds ~1515.", "price": 1631.50},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Add on breakout", "reason": "Closing strength; a decisive move above 287 (today’s high ~286.85) can extend the PSU/defence trend. Stop on adds ~276.", "price": 285.50},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Add on strength", "reason": "Stuck under 430 supply. Cleaner momentum only on a push through 430–432 with volume. Risk marker ~404.", "price": 424.55},
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "signal": "Buy on strength or buy-the-dip", "reason": "Coiling below 145.2 trigger; continuation if 145.2 clears. Alternatively accumulate 140–141 with stop ~137.5.", "price": 141.33},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Hold/Trail; add on strength", "reason": "Pharma leadership; strong close near highs. Consider add above 1025; trail stop ~965 on existing.", "price": 1021.85},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Momentum add on breakout", "reason": "High-volume day; continuation above 117.5 can open next leg. Stop on adds ~111.5.", "price": 116.82},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Tight base under 414–415; a clean push through can start a fresh leg. Stop ~392 on fresh buys.", "price": 410.15},
    {"symbol": "BIOCON", "signal": "Buy on strength", "reason": "Pharma relative strength; continuation trigger above 423 with risk to ~405.", "price": 420.95}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "LTF", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Risk management trail—if 291 (recent pivot/line-in-sand) breaks, trim exposure to protect capital.", "quantity": 7, "price": "SL-M 291.00"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 167.80,
    "total_value": 27639.95,
    "holdings_count": 8,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ 2385.00 (CMP 2811.90)",
      "LTF: 14 units @ 275.59 (CMP 299.40)",
      "BEL: 10 units @ 419.45 (CMP 424.55)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ 900.05 (CMP 1021.85)",
      "BHEL: 10 units @ 265.49 (CMP 285.50)",
      "SAIL: 30 units @ 142.68 (CMP 141.33)",
      "CDSL: 3 units @ 1617.60 (CMP 1631.50)",
      "NBCC: 10 units @ 114.14 (CMP 116.82)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Pharma leadership sustained: LAURUSLABS strong close; BIOCON near 423 trigger; LUPIN/ALKEM firm. Prefer adds on strength or controlled dips; trail winners.",
    "Exchanges/Depositories theme constructive: BSE basing just under 2837; CDSL holding >1600; MCX extended—prefer dips.",
    "PSU/Defence: BHEL shows follow-through potential >287; BEL needs >430–432; HAL trend intact near 4795—buy only on retests.",
    "Telecom towers: INDUSTOWER coiling under 414–415; watch for high-volume breakout.",
    "Metals mixed: SAIL coiling below 145.2; HINDCOPPER steady around 338—prefer dips with tight stops.",
    "Infra/Rail PSU: RVNL constructive (breakout watch >335.7); IRCON steady; HUDCO strong—look for 232–235 retests.",
    "NBFCs/Banks: LTF regained 300 zone intraday; maintain 291 trail. PSU banks (IOB/UCO/CENTRALBK/IDBI) active but extended—buy only on dips.",
    "Renewables: INOXWIND volatile with large range; WAAREEENER soft; NTPCGREEN range-bound—wait for decisive breaks.",
    "Discretionary/Durables: VOLTAS firm; JUBLFOOD needs >619 confirmation; TRENT stable.",
    "Execution: If Monday gaps >0.7%, let first 20–30 minutes set ranges; favor pullback entries over chasing opening spikes. Keep stops tight given extended pockets."
  ]
}
